mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bookmark (user_id, folder_id, exchange_post_id, event_post_id) VALUES (#{userId}, #{folderId}, #{exchangePostId}, #{eventPostId})
mapper.select: SELECT bookmark_id AS bookmarkId, user_id AS userId, folder_id AS folderId, exchange_post_id AS exchangePostId, event_post_id AS eventPostId, bookmarked_at AS bookmarkedAt FROM bookmark WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY bookmarked_at DESC
